channel.title: Matter for Ramanathan Kathiresan
channel.itunes:author: Matter
channel.itunes:summary: These are the audio versions of stories saved in your Matter queue.

item.title: Containers as a Service(CaaS) Explained
item.description: First, let’s learn more about containers as a service. What are containers as a service? CaaS is a cloud-based service hosted by a third-party provider that helps manage and deploy containerized applications.
item.content:encoded: First, let’s learn more about containers as a service. What are containers as a service? CaaS is a cloud-based service hosted by a third-party provider that helps manage and deploy containerized applications.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: First, let’s learn more about containers as a service. What are containers as a service? CaaS is a cloud-based service hosted by a third-party provider that helps manage and deploy containerized applications.

item.title: Putting Ideas into Words
item.description: It's only when you try to put them into words that you discover they're not. So if you never subject your ideas to that test, you'll not only never have fully formed ideas, but also never realize it.
item.content:encoded: It's only when you try to put them into words that you discover they're not. So if you never subject your ideas to that test, you'll not only never have fully formed ideas, but also never realize it.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: It's only when you try to put them into words that you discover they're not. So if you never subject your ideas to that test, you'll not only never have fully formed ideas, but also never realize it.

item.title: Cloudflare acquires ‘modern’ CASB, aims to become most-deployed SASE
item.description: Cloudflare surveyed the CASB market broadly as it investigated whether to partner with a vendor, acquire a vendor, or internally develop capabilities to bring CASB functionality to its SASE platform, he said.
item.content:encoded: Cloudflare surveyed the CASB market broadly as it investigated whether to partner with a vendor, acquire a vendor, or internally develop capabilities to bring CASB functionality to its SASE platform, he said.
